diagramViewPart.Name: Clipboard
diagramViewPart.ShortDescription: Diagram clipboard is used to copy and paste diagram elements from one diagram to another.

diagramViewPart.Name: Connected Reaction
diagramViewPart.ShortDescription: Table of reactions used in the model

function.name: createPlot
function.description: Creates plot.

function.name: createPen
function.description: Creates pen.

function.name: createStatisticalBarChart
function.description: Creates statistical bar chart.

argument.name: settings
argument.description: bar chart settings

function.name: getSolvers
function.description: Gets available solver names.

function.name: getSolver
function.description: Gets the current solver name.

function.name: setSolver
function.description: Sets solver by its name.

argument.name: name
argument.description: the solver name.

function.name: getOptions
function.description: Gets option names for the specified solver.

argument.name: solver
argument.description: the solver name.

function.name: getOption
function.description: Gets value of the option with the specified name for the current solver.

argument.name: optionName
argument.description: the option name.

function.name: setOption
function.description: Sets value of the option with the specified name for the current solver.

argument.name: optionName
argument.description: the option name.

argument.name: value
argument.description: the option value.

function.name: getOptionInfo
function.description: Gets info of the option with the specified name for the specified solver.

argument.name: optionName
argument.description: the option name.

argument.name: solver
argument.description: the solver name.

function.name: createSpan
function.description: Creates span for the diagram simulation.

argument.name: startTime
argument.description: the initial time point of the simulation.

argument.name: endTime
argument.description: the completion time point of the simulation.

argument.name: timeIncrement
argument.description: the delta for time. The less increment the more calculations will be made by a solver to get values of variables, but it is time consuming.

returns.description: created UniformSpan in the case of non-zero time increment or created ArraySpan otherwise.

function.name: compileModel
function.description: Compiles model from diagram.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: The diagram to compile.

argument.name: logging
argument.description: If true then additional information will be logged.

function.name: simulateModel
function.description: Simulates compiled model.

argument.name: model
argument.description: Model to simulate.

argument.name: span
argument.description: The simulation span. See 'createSpan' function for further details.

argument.name: logging
argument.description: If true then additional information will be logged.

returns.description: Generated SimulationResult on success or null otherwise.

function.name: simulate
function.description: Simulates the diagram.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: The diagram to simulate.

argument.name: span
argument.description: The simulation span. See 'createSpan' function for further details.

argument.name: logging
argument.description: If true then additional information will be logged.

returns.description: Generated SimulationResult on success or null otherwise.

function.name: writeResult
function.description: Writes simulation result to the specified file.

argument.name: result
argument.description: Simulation result to write.

argument.name: path
argument.description: Path to destination file.

argument.name: delimiter
argument.description: Numeric data delimiter

argument.name: logging
argument.description: If true then additional information will be logged.

function.name: saveResults
function.description: Saves result of the diagram simulation by the specified path of DataCollection.

argument.name: simulationResult
argument.description: the simulation result to save.

argument.name: dataElementPath
argument.description: the path to simulation result in repository.

argument.name: description
argument.description: the simulation result description.

function.name: saveResultsTable
function.description: Saves result of the diagram simulation by the specified path as TableDataCollection.

argument.name: simulationResult
argument.description: the simulation result to save.

argument.name: dataElementPath
argument.description: the path to simulation result table in repository.

argument.name: description
argument.description: the simulation result description.

function.name: plotResults
function.description: Plots result of the diagram simulation.

argument.name: simulationResult
argument.description: the simulation result to plot.

argument.name: variables
argument.description: the identifiers of diagram variables to plot.

argument.name: lineSpec
argument.description: the argument that defines three components used for lines specification: line style, marker symbol and color.

function.name: getInitialValue
function.description: Gets initial value of the specified variable.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to get initial value of the variable.

argument.name: variableName
argument.description: the name of the variable to get initial value of.

function.name: setInitialValue
function.description: Sets initial value of the specified variable.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to set initial value of the variable.

argument.name: variableName
argument.description: the name of the variable to set initial value of.

argument.name: value
argument.description: initial value.

function.name: getInitialValues
function.description: Gets initial values of the specified variables.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to get initial values of variables.

argument.name: variableNames
argument.description: an array of variables identifiers to get initial values of. If the array is null, the method returns the array of initial values of all diagram variables.

returns.description: an array of initial variable values.

function.name: setInitialValues
function.description: Sets initial values of the specified variables.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to set initial values of variables.

argument.name: variableNames
argument.description: an array of variables names to set initial values of. If the array is null, the method sets initial values of all diagram variables.

argument.name: values
argument.description: an array of initial values represented by real numbers. The array length must be equal to the length of variableNames array if it is not null or the number of diagram variables otherwise.

function.name: getBoundaryCondition
function.description: Gets boundary condition of the specified variable. Note that the method returns conditions only for diagram variables and not for diagram parameters.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to get boundary condition of the variable.

argument.name: variableName
argument.description: the name of the variable to get boundary condition of.

function.name: setBoundaryCondition
function.description: Sets boundary condition of the specified variable. The method can not be applyed to the diagram parameters.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to set boundary condition of the variable

argument.name: variableName
argument.description: the name of the variable to set boundary condition of.

argument.name: value
argument.description: the boundary condition to be set.

function.name: getBoundaryConditions
function.description: Gets boundary conditions for diagram variables and 'false' for diagram parameters.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to get boundary conditions of variables.

returns.description: an array of diagram variables with boundary conditions.

function.name: setBoundaryConditions
function.description: Sets boundary conditions for diagram variables. The method can not be applyed to diagram parameters.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to set boundary conditions of variables.

argument.name: variableNames
argument.description: an array of variables identifiers to set boundary conditions.

function.name: clearAllBoundaryConditions
function.description: Sets boundary conditions of all diagrams variables equal to 'false'.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to clear boundary conditions.

function.name: isConstant
function.description: Specifies if the diagram variable is constant.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to specify if the variable is constant.

argument.name: variableName
argument.description: the name of the variable to specify is it constant or not.

returns.description: 'true' if the variable is constant or 'false' otherwise.

function.name: setConstant
function.description: Sets constant property of the specified diagram variable equal to the specified value.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to set constant property of the variable.

argument.name: variableName
argument.description: the name of the variable to set constant property of.

argument.name: value
argument.description: the constant property of the variable to be set.

function.name: getConstants
function.description: Gets an array of constant variables names.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to get constant variables of.

returns.description: an array of constant variables identifiers.

function.name: setConstants
function.description: Sets specified diagram variables to be constant.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to set variables to be constant.

argument.name: variableNames
argument.description: an array of identifiers of diagram variables to be constant.

function.name: clearAllConstants
function.description: Sets constant properties of all diagram variables equal to 'false'.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to clear variables constant properties.

function.name: getVariableNames
function.description: Gets identifiers of all diagram variables.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to get variables names of.

function.name: getVariables
function.description: Gets all variables (species and parameters) of the diagram.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to get variables of.

function.name: getVariable
function.description: Gets diagram variable by its name.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to get variable of.

argument.name: variableName
argument.description: the name of the variable.

function.name: getMath
function.description: Gets diagram mathematical object (equation, function or event) by name.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to get mathematical object of.

argument.name: mathName
argument.description: the name of the mathematical object.

function.name: clone
function.description: Clones the diagram.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to be cloned.

argument.name: name
argument.description: the name for the cloned diagram.

returns.description: Created clone of the diagram with new name and old origin.

function.name: createAssignment
function.description: Creates assignment to perform after triggering of a diagram event.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram for which the assignment is created.

argument.name: variable
argument.description: the identifier of the diagram parameter or variable which value will be changed after triggering of the event.

argument.name: math
argument.description: the formula for calculation the new value of the variable after the event triggering.

returns.description: created Assignment on success or null otherwise.

function.name: addEvent
function.description: Adds an event to the specified diagram.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to add an event to.

argument.name: trigger
argument.description: boolean expression triggering the event.

argument.name: delay
argument.description: double number representing time of the event delay.

argument.name: actions
argument.description: array of assignments performed after the event triggering.

function.name: addEquation
function.description: Adds an equation to the specified diagram.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to add equation to.

argument.name: type
argument.description: the type of the equation: 'algebraic', 'rate', 'scalar' or 'initial assignment'.

argument.name: variable
argument.description: the identifier of the diagram parameter or variable which value will be calculated by formula.

argument.name: formula
argument.description: the formula for calculation of variable value.

function.name: createSpecieReference
function.description: Creates a participant to produce a chemical reaction in a diagram.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram containing the specie to create the reaction involving it.

argument.name: variable
argument.description: the identifier of the specie in the diagram.

argument.name: role
argument.description: the role of the specie in the reaction: 'reactant', 'product' or 'modifier'.

argument.name: stoichiometry
argument.description: the stoichiometric coefficient representing the degree to which the specie participates in the reaction, by default is equal to '1.0'.

returns.description: created SpecieReference on success or null otherwise.

function.name: addReaction
function.description: Adds reaction to the diagram.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to add reaction to.

argument.name: formula
argument.description: the formula of the reaction kinetic law.

argument.name: faste
argument.description: whether the reaction is fast or not, by default is 'false'.

argument.name: specieReferences
argument.description: an array of the reaction participants. For futher details see 'createSpecieReference' function.

function.name: addSpecies
function.description: Adds new species to the diagram.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: the diagram to add specie to.

argument.name: dataElementPath
argument.description: the path to the data element corresponding to some specie in BioUML repository or the name of the specie.

argument.name: initialValue
argument.description: initial value of the specie.

function.name: split
function.description: Split diagram into modules.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: Diagram to split.

argument.name: names
argument.description: Names of selected diagram elements.

argument.name: result
argument.description: Result diagram name.

function.name: addBuses
function.description: Add buses to subdiagram.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: Diagram containing subdiagram.

function.name: generateEvents
function.description: Add events to diagram based on tabular data.

argument.name: table
argument.description: Source table.

argument.name: timeName
argument.description: Name of column with time.

argument.name: diagram
argument.description: Target diagram.

property.name: LongDescription
property.value: Convert diagram to selected type (you will be prompted on new diagram location)

property.name: ShortDescription
property.value: Remove selected elements from the diagram

property.name: ShortDescription
property.value: Save selected subset as new diagram

property.name: ShortDescription
property.value: Add elements from graph search (upstream one step)

property.name: ShortDescription
property.value: Add elements from graph search (downstream one step)

property.name: ShortDescription
property.value: Align elements to the upper border

property.name: ShortDescription
property.value: Align elements to the lower border

property.name: ShortDescription
property.value: Align elements to the left border

property.name: ShortDescription
property.value: Align elements to the right border

property.name: ShortDescription
property.value: Try to reinitialize this collection again

property.name: LongDescription
property.value: Try to reinitialize this collection again
